Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 20 Atītārammaṇattika » 20.1 Paṭiccavāra » 20.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 20.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Atītārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
6.
2670Atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
7.
2671Anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
8.
2672Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
